website_summaries.verdict: A plant-based stain remover that removes even the toughest stains and odors.
pros: Eliminates stains and odors using 6 plant-based enzymes
Use as a pre-treater to remove tough stains before laundering your clothes
Not tested on animals and safe for delicate materials
cons: Unscented, but some don't like the natural scent of the spray

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic about almost everything. So when I read the information and reviews about this product, I thought "Nothing is that good." Well, Puracy certainly is pretty good. My favorite stains to try products on are grease/oil-based. Most do OK, but the stain is not always gone. Puracy took out the stain perfectly. Not only that, it took other stains I thought would set and stay forever. I've tried just about every stain remover on the market, and found some are good for this and some for that, but none were good for all the stains. I am wiling to admit this one sure looks like it can take on anything. I'm not only impressed, I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: P. Penwood

customer_reviews.title: rating stars above didn’t  let me rate how well this product works?  Isn’t this the whole point?
customer_reviews.text: This is the stain remover I’m staying with forever. I like to change things up and try new things, but this stain remover checks all the boxes. It gets out stains! The smell is gentle and not offensive. The older I get, the more strong smells bother me. This is great if you’re like me. The spray bottle is easy to use, even with my arthritic hands. I learned a trick years ago: keep a bottle of stain remover at every hamper throughout your house. Before you throw your dirty clothes into the hamper, give the stain a shot and wash clothes when you get around to it. Final step: get off of Amazon and fold clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for newborn poop
customer_reviews.text: We'd gotten this as a gift and have liked (and used) it enough we've ordered more. We've been using it to get poop out of clothing from inevitable newborn blowouts. We spray and let it sit before washing and haven't been able to find any stain remnants after sending things through the wash, including white parts of onesies. We wondered if it was all placebo effect and that we just had a really good washing machine or detergent or stain-resistant onesies. But then I forgot to spray it on something and it was clear that it was really this doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first bottle, the testing period is officially complete. I'm hooked for life. Our house's biggest issues: cooking oils, food stains, ink, grease. Puracy conquered them all on the first try. Also worked on blood and dried paint. Spray, tell Alexa to set a timer for 15 minutes, wash, & stains are history, my friend. It's so dorky to be excited about a stain remover, I know. Adulting is so lame. But this one really does the job. And it's natural and plant derived, so it doubles as a lovely vinaigrette. Just kidding on that last bit. Maybe. I dunno, could be true. It says it's gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: CB in FL

customer_reviews.title: Stain?! What stain?! Finally, a natural stain remover that works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever been more impressed by a product. I have used this product on shirt that have had stains for a great deal of time, or awful armpit smells. After letting this spray do it's magic, there were no signs of any stains and no fowl odors! I CAN NOT live without this product and, unless they change their formula, I will never use another stain remover again! For anyone looking to live a more natural, chemical free/limited lifestyle, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina O'Krongley

customer_reviews.title: Got grape smoothie out of my berber carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Soon after this product was delivered, hubby accidentally tripped over a bottle of Naked blueberry smoothie and all of it got into carpet. Wish I would have taken before and after pictures but I just dried it as much as possible with paper towels, applied this, waited a minute and scrubbed everything right out! No residue no marks! Also have used this for cloth diaper hand-washing and it does a decent job but doesn't eliminate odor entirely...
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove stains from underarm area on white shirts. It says the longer you leave it on after spraying/scrubbing, the better... I sprayed 2 white shirts in that area twice, washed them twice, third time I sprayed them, let it sit for >24 hrs and then washed them again and still nothing... other than that, so far i believe it has helped with other stain removal on other items, just not those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Remove Stains
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product at all. It didn't remove the most basic of stains no matter how much I used - I could saturate the mark (fruit, juice, coffee, etc.) immediately after and throw it in the wash, and there would still be a stain afterwards. I'm terribly disappointed in this product and would never purchase again, nor will I be using the rest of it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tsty

customer_reviews.title: Works on fresh poop!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love this stuff. Used it on baby poop, Mommy poop (hemorrhoids, grrr), and our leather couch. Stains were removed from the clothes completely (everything was still freshly stained when applied) and we just did an overall cleaning with the leather sofa. We will probably reattack the sofa for stains specifically later but it worked well to get breast milk spitup off of the leather. My only complaint is that there is no mist setting on the sprayers and the product is thick (like a liquid detergent) so it doesn't absorb immediately causing a waste if product. I will definitely be buying more whenever we need it.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great,
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stain and spot remover! This is my second bottle. I purchased a two pack because my mother-in-law tried mine and wanted one as well. Gets out grease spots and blood stains grass stains food stains. Spray it on, rub it in, let it sit for 15 minutes or longer if necessary. Wash it and it’s good to go. Even if you’ve dried the article of clothing, you can spray it and rewash.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Magic fabric defilement remover
customer_reviews.text: This liquid magic makes all the oopsies go away. I only got this because I saw a YouTube video on baby must haves but boy I wish I knew about this before! My family spilled red wine on a white shirt; gone. Got coffee stains; out. Chocolate; no problem. Olive oil; taken care of. Baby food; yes. Baby poop; most of the time.... sometimes I don’t think anything can be done about that mess... Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kobi

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover out there!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! We have been using Puracy stain remover for several months now, and it’s performed better than every other stain remover I’ve tried over the years. It even removes those pesky grease stains that seem to appear out of nowhere. The ultimate test was seeing how Puracy performed on my son’s work clothes after a night of making kettle corn at work. His shirt and pants had oil splatters and spills all over them, and after a good spray down with Puracy, they came out of the wash looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets stains out! and natural, too.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well to get stains out. I leave a bottle in each bathroom for the kids to use. I've had good results on blood, food, poop, and other gross stains (kids! what can you do?). If you accidentally mistake it for the Puracy all-purpose cleaning spray, as I've done several times, it doesn't seem to do any harm. Also, I haven't had any trouble with the shipping, since the bottles are sealed and the pump is shipped alongside it. I also really like the spray applicator for stain removers as opposed to the brush or stick methods. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: SKTX

customer_reviews.title: best Eco stain remover--the search is over
customer_reviews.text: I could go on and on--about how many "organic" and "natural" laundry items I have used--7th generation, babyganics (great other products, the stain remover is terrible) eco(something), ECover (actually really good), The laundress (really good for laundry generally), BacOut (more useful for anything and everything else), Caldrea, Mrs. Meyers...the list goes on. BUT as far as getting out stains of clothing--this is by far the best I have used thus far. I highly recommend--honestly, I think my search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdida

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product twice because I love it so much! It honestly and truly works on just about anything! Stains I have used it on with 100% success include: grass stains, red colored drinks and popsicle stains, ketchup stains, baby poop blowout stains, spit up stains, throw up stains, paint from art class stains, non permanent marker stains, blood stains, grease stains, and car/machine oil stains(these are the only things I've personally tried using it on, these are multiple uses with complete success). The ONLY stain it hasn't removed after 3 tries, mustard. I love this product, you don't have to use a lot, it's natural, great price, and just an awesome product worth trying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have three older dogs who may or may not let me know they need to go outside add to this a light colored carpet! You can see why I have been searching for an amazing stain remover. I found it! Not only does this stuff work it is also environmentally friendly. I had used another cleaner on the set in stain which did not work, I sprayed this on the stain, let it sit for 8 hours and the stain was gone. Yes, it does take longer for those really stubborn stains but trust me it is worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!! Smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Husband had a food stain on a sweatshirt... Used a spray stain remover, added some oxiclean versatile to load, dried it. Didn’t come out. 😟 This product had such good reviews that I figured it was worth a try & bought it. Used it on the same stain & it came out the 1st time - we were both impressed! Spray on, let it set 15 minutes, wash & dry as usual. 😊 (Didn’t even need to try the “8 hour minimum” method!)
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a baby who spits up on everything, and we’re cloth diapering him. As such, we do a lot of heavy duty laundry. It’s not only good for our son’s clothes but also for ours. This spray does a good job on the baby clothes, as well as getting grease stains out of the adult clothes. It works better if you allow the spray to sit on the laundry a little bit before washing, but I haven’t noticed a difference over 1/2 hour or so of pretreatment.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a horrible smell on clothes
customer_reviews.text: Scent prior to use is a pleasant citrus, yet after washing leaves a horrible foul vomit like scent on the clothes. Smell has yet to come out after multiple washes. Was not used on vomit nor with anything that had been vomit on it. When I’d read other recyabout this I thought super strange especially when product arrived and smells so fresh. Do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for new stains, ineffective for old stains.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product several times and even contacted the manufacturer to make sure I was using it 100% correctly. Stains that are pre-existing, i.e. you have washed and not removed using previous methods DO NOT COME OUT. I tried this on about 30 shirts, and the only stains that were removed were new stains that had been treated, but not yet washed. So, if you want to get out a brand new stain, this product seem to be OK. If you want to remove a stain that you have tried and failed with.... I don't suggest you waste your time or money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective for a Natural Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works surprisingly well, especially given that it is made using plant enzymes. It won't take off non-organic stains (dirt, mud, etc), but works really well on organic stains. I spray it on stains when I take them off, that gives the Puracy stain remover plenty of time to do its work. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: svaraman

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm on laundry stains that nothing else worked on! Super concentrated and smells good! Easy on hands and rubs easily into (instead of running off) stains. Worked on tea, rust, and other marks without discoloring fabrics I've thus far tried.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: I'm a slob. This takes care of it.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot seem to get thru the day without one of my meals making it's way onto the polo shirts that I wear to work daily. This product takes care of it all from pizza sauce to oils, etc. I usually soak the stain and throw everything in the wash. I set the timer on the washing machine to start in two hours so Puracy has some time to work on the stains before the wash cycle begins. This stuff really works well!
customer_reviews.author: Zarasa

customer_reviews.title: Stain remover WIN
customer_reviews.text: I am not known for being a good laundress. I have two boys (7 &10) and a messy husband. I have tried so many stain removers that have not worked. I don't have time to add a multi-step stain removing regimen into my already overwhelming laundry demand. I was initially skeptical, but I had a friend with two small boys too. Her family's clothes were NEVER stained. She told me she uses puracy so I tried it. It smells great and is plant based! I have not met a stain it didn't take care of yet! Red clay, blood, heavy dirt, food stains, grease.....gets it all!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have foundPuracy stain remover to do a great job. Some of my shirts had old washed and fried in grease stains and this stuff got them out. I recommend it to all my friends and have supplied it to my adult kids. They all like how it works.
customer_reviews.author: The Pxlfxr

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to get antiperspirant stains off of my shirts. I didn't notice any improvement in pit stains with this product. Didn't try it on any other stains but definitely not great for pit stains.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on a local news station in Grand Rapids Michigan showing "The best products to try" I entered a give away through Richett Media and won these products!!!I love these products, they are all natural and I think this is the best stain remover ever! I also love the baby lotion, and dish soap. I am ordering it for future housewarming gifts Great products to turn others on to.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Stain Remover We've Found
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have always used natural replacements and stain removers have always been a challenge. My wife was shocked at how well this worked. We shared it with my mom and she was also surprised at how well it worked--even better than chemical products she's always used. If you want a great product that isn't harmful to our health and the environment, this is a great option. I would request that the manufacturer try to find a way to use less plastic or to use non-petroleum-based plastic. They do have a refill option, but even this uses more plastic than we'd like. Great stain remover!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bressler

customer_reviews.title: This amazing stuff is not a gimmick
customer_reviews.text: This might seem like a gimmick, but it's not. If you follow the directions (spray and leave on for quite a long time before washing) it gets out stains that are normally impossible to remove. This is so so much more effective than Spray and Wash, Shout, or the Oxy products.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H. Van Deusen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a product that would remove deodrant and sweat stains on my work shirts and blouses when I came across this item. Two bottles for $20?!? To good to be true I thought. Boy was I wrong! I’ve never used a stain remover that works so well, this stuff is amazing and it’s all natural. It works on all kinds of stains and ground-in dirt, including deodrant and sweat. I just spray it on, leave it overnight and wash the next day, and the stains are gone! You certainly won’t regret buying this product, it’s Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Just Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry pretreatment spray
customer_reviews.text: We use this spray in several ways. It is nearly no-fail on stains. Spray then let sit around 15 minutes before washing. And sometimes it will remove grease spots missed on clothing that has gone through a wash and dry cycle. Best product imo of it's kind.
customer_reviews.author: Faye A.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: It works somewhat but not the great stain remover I was expecting even after soaking for 8 hours as suggested. One bottle only for 4 shirts... I would have returned but I don't know if I would have been allowed to returned half used. Dissaponted!
customer_reviews.author: gatormom2

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: What else to say.. the stains didn't go and the cloth seems 'used' like old and scruffy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherin Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Almost A Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this enzyme stain remover two days ago but I have used it in several loads of laundry and am very pleased with the results. The underarm stains on a couple of shirts are completely gone! But the best part is that my dog blankets smell SO much better. I left the spray on them overnight and washed in the morning and they don't smell so doggy now! It is close to a miracle!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol I.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, if you haven't tried this product, please do! It works, it works, it works!!! Better than any commercial stain remover that I usually use. I'm completely happy with it and I am ordering it again. They also make an all-surface cleaner that I ordered and I like that, also.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Puracy Natural Laundry Spray works amazingly. My youngest little one has occasional nose bleeds at night. Her nose bled on her practically white sheets. They have a white background and a pastel colored design on them. Also her solid white mattress protector had blood stains as well. I washed her sheets and protector when the blood was two days old. Prior to washing I sprayed puracy on the dried blood stain and immediately threw it in the wash. The sheets came out spotless! I wish I would have taken before and after photos! This stuff is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: mobu

customer_reviews.title: The Meryl Streep of Stain Removers - Must Own!
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews don’t lie. This will get out any stain. Blood, oil stains, oil stains... I don’t know how I’ve ever lived life without it. If there was an awards ceremony for stain removers, this would be the Meryl Streep of stain removers. It’s fantastic. It smells nice. It’s gentle. It is absolute laundry perfection. I almost wish I had more stains so I could use it all the time and watch it work it’s magic. A MUST buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stain remover.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on a light color cotton dish towel; it had large coffee stains on it and had been washed since the staining took place. I did not have time to let this Puracy Natural Laundry Stain Remover take more than 15 minutes tops to work. It removed all of the coffee stains!!! I am so happy to find a non-toxic stain remover that really works. I received two 25 fl. ounce bottles, each with a sprayer attachment. No unpleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: BUMPSEY

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have used this and the baby version. Both products clear up ANY stain I have put them on, even dried raspberry. I highly recommend if you need a good stain remover. The only concern I do have though, is that it says "natural", but to "avoid breathing in the mist while spraying stains". This is confusing given it's non-toxic labeling, but as I said, it does the trick to remove stains and appears to be one of the more natural choices in the cleaning market.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle needs improving
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer isn’t that good. It only does a straight stream which makes it hard to spray an area without completely soaking it. I thought I read a review that this was improved but not with the bottles I received.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best stain remover I have ever used. You can spray it on a couple days before you do laundry, and it doesn't stain. It has taken out some stains that other products couldn't touch. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NavyMom

customer_reviews.title: Removes old, washed-in stains
customer_reviews.text: I got this to remove old stains that had already been laundered. I wanted to make one last attempt before tossing. I followed the directions and the stains came out! This is also great to use on baby garmets. I feel it's a much safer alternative. I recommend this to all my new mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Swogger

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This gets EVERYTHING out. Blood, butter, lipstick, charcoal toothpaste, bright yellow stains, tomato soup, avocado stains, really everything. I spray it on my stain, scrub it with an old toothbrush and let it sit for a day or two. Toss it in the wash and boom! Stain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I am a diva when it comes to washing clothes and getting out stains. This item REALLY works wonders. I truly have about 10 other stain removing products. This is now the ONLY one I use. Really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I sweat profusely and wear several layers of deodorant/antiperspirant. These layers leave a waxy coating on my shirts that is just about impossible to get out. I've tried everything but have thrown away many shirts after one or two wears. I tried this spray today and wasn't expecting much. I was wrong. I sprayed each shirt, gave it a little rub, let it soak sit for ten minutes, and then washed. When I pulled them out of the dryer, the stains were gone. This spray even worked on shirts I have laundered several times. The stains were set in, and I figured I'd have to throw them away. Nope....no more stains.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to have found this stain remover. I've searched for a long time to find a safer alternative than the smelly chemical versions out there. Puracy laundry stain remover works better than ANY I have ever used! I had pet stains on a down comforter that had been previously treated w/another product, washed, & dried. Even after the stains were "set" from being dried, I sprayed Puracy on my comforter, gently scrubbed in w/a toothbrush, and let it set for a couple hours. Then I washed & dryed the comforter and had NO STAINS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I was a little skeptical at first but reading others reviews sold me and I'm glad I bought it. I mainly use it for my NB baby's clothes and it magically takes off poop and spit up stains in a heartbeat. I love the fact that it's safe and natural so it doesn't harm her delicate skin after wash with also organic natural detergent. Believe the reviews- this works!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I saw the great reviews and bought this product because of it
customer_reviews.text: I saw the great reviews and bought this product because of it. It has delivered as promised and taken out dirt stains that never come out of clothing even when bleached. Both my parents are in a nursing home so you can imagine the laundry odor issues. The product has also has taken out odors. Between my mother and me, we are so sensitive I had to switch all laundry products to only free and clear ones. This enzyme based stain remover is much better than the other products I have tried and it is a spray which works well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Belpedio

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY WORKS!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of Puracy Natural Laundry Stain Remover (2-Pack). I recently put my clothes through the dryer with a piece of chocolate in one of my pockets! I thought all of my clothes were ruined, and then I remembered my Puracy in the basement by the washer. I sprayed all the clothes affected and scrubbed the spots with a tooth brush. I then soaked the clothing in a mix of cold water and Puracy for about 20 minutes. If you can believe it, i was left with NO stains. All of my clothes are clean. I had to go online and order more, because i want to have this around whenever i need it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is my most valuable piece of advice for any new moms...buy this stain remover your pockets and mind will thank you later. Any baby stain will be eliminated. Beets, blueberries and even mango stains are gone! I love it! It’s the best stain remover my family and I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagoforthree

customer_reviews.title: Miracle spray!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle product and I recommend it to everyone with small children! So far, I’ve used it to remove blood, chocolate, and berry stains. This did the trick with no need for any scrubbing on my part whatsoever, even on white clothing. This has saved me countless hours on laundry (and dollars on replacement clothing)!
customer_reviews.author: Chicagomum

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and sprayed on white hoodie with stains, left it sit over night, threw in washer, stains came out a little, but could still see them, tried several times, stains still there!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results - Removes even the toughest deodorant!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is BEYOND AMAZING!!!! I hated laundry day because of the deodorant I use (which I love as well, Pit Paste) but it leaves a waxy build-up that required a lot of work and several steps to remove. I have tried so many products but nothing worked well. This is so simple and effective- just spray it on and launder. Best stuff ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best stain remover I’ve ever used plus it’s non toxic.... I have 3 small children and they are always staining their clothes one way or another. I pretreat the stains and no matter what it is this gets it out. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cara Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product, together with hydrogen peroxide and oxiclean got really blood saturated fabric totally clean. It works well on standard soiled clothing before washing w/o additional washing aides
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm! The proof is in the pudding! Or in the berries 😆
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! This is blue berries, black berries and strawberry on this clothing item. I didn’t even allow the stain remover to sit like the instructions said to. I rinsed in cold water, sprayed the stains, rubbed it in, and threw it in the washer in cold cycle. Bam! No more stains!!!! Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Candace mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 0-2 day old stains
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got three small kids and we have tons of stains, it’s a daily thing here. This stuff works great, especially if you spray on when you take it off your kids and let it set overnight. It does NOT work well on set in stains that are more than 2-3 days old just so you know. But it’s excellent for 0-2 day old stains.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Makes stains vanish.
customer_reviews.text: This gets out stains if you use it right. Best to let it sit and do its magic. Nice enzyme based formula for stains such as grass, food, blood. For blood I used a little hydrogen peroxide to give it a boost and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wilson

customer_reviews.title: USE IN PLACE OF BLEACH
customer_reviews.text: i swear by this product, the smell is always completely lifted and blood and pee stains are always completely gone after rubbing the product in and washing out with cold water. However, this will make colors run, especially on things that haven't been washed many times before. My suggestion is to use it as if it was a natural, pet and baby safe bleach. I will always use this on my mattress after my kitten does an accidnt and my underwear after my other kitten does a bloody accident :/ HIGHLY RECOMMEND but don't use it on your colors
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby poop stains!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just works! I don’t know how, but I don’t really care. It gets baby poop stains out even after they’ve been washed and dried. Also works well on our sheets and pillowcases. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover. Being a farmer's wife, Puracy stain remover is a must for all laundry. Removes oil, dirt, grass stains, grease, blood to coffee and tea stain, etc. I also use it to spot clean upholstery! Love Puracy Natural!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It removed a fresh blood stain from an off-white carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: It removed a fresh blood stain from an off-white carpet! Shipping needs a little improvement - despite appearing to be fully sealed both at the bottle caps and inside a plastic bag, some of the product had leaked. Both the inside and outside of the bag was slightly damp as were the bottles. This was not noticed until after a wet mark was found n the wood hallway table.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works better than shout!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I use it more on my floor rug and carpet shampooer more than I do laundry! It gets rid of husband and animal stains! I spray my rug and run the shampooer over it and viola it’s clean
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gets stains OUT
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing. I had a towel stained with something(?) that would never wash out and when I tried this one time, the stain is actually gone. Not kidding. I didn't give 5 stars only because I was hoping for a more liqudy spray to use on clothing, the car, smelly shoes, etc., more like a natural enzyme Febreeze solution. This product is thick and soapy and should only be used for laundry purposes.
customer_reviews.author: LatteAlameda

customer_reviews.title: The best so far!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts but this stain remover does the best of all that I have tried!! One squirt and all sports are gone. I don't own a shirt that doesn't have spot on it when it goes in the wash. Yes I am one of those, apparently. My shelf gets in the way and food WILL land there, every time. This stuff works!! Love the laundry soap too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Weigel

customer_reviews.title: It's As Good as Everybody Says It Is
customer_reviews.text: Spray ring around the collar (and cuffs and any stains), cover to keep from drying out, and wash normally a few days later. I revived shirts I thought I'd have to throw away. This stuff is AMAZING. The ring around the collar is gone. Not faded or mitigated or lessened - gone without a trace. Now I'm going to go and buy more white shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This product really works
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal. Works better than any other product I’ve tried, even removing old stains on clothing that had been relegated to the ‘yard work’ drawer. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The best stain remover I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids (i.e. lots of stains). I have tried so many laundry stain removers and this one is by far the best I've used. It works on everything from the baby's blowouts to the preschooler's food stains to the kindergartener's marker stains. I'm half considering buying a bunch just in case they stop selling it. I don't write many reviews but I selfishly want to get the word out that this stuff is great so people buy it and they keep selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridesmaid

customer_reviews.title: Gets out ANY stain!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on my daughters clothing stains from all types of food. Stains on my carpet and furniture and even mildew stains! Gets out everything from chocolate pudding to blood. I've bought it many times over and over and will keep using it! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Gets out everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for stain removal. You definitely need to agitate the stain (I use a bamboo vegetable scrubber) and let it sit on the material for a while. I've got everything from dried spray paint, blood, tomato sauce and baby poop out with this stuff. Also love that it's natural and doesn't smell like chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Puracy stain remover works really well. I have it auto-shipped and have been using it for years. It smells good and I am all about supporting business' that are safe for the environment, including our homes and also who give back to our communities. Puracy works very well.. I would say 97% of the time. Occasionally, I have come across situations where some fabrics have seemed to bleach out from it so if it feels questionable then do a test first and also, not all stains come out of all fabrics but most of them seem to with Puracy. This seems in line with most stain-remover products but with so many extra environmental benefits added on!
customer_reviews.author: Mary MacLean

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes out underarm orders from clothing especially women's blouses. I've tried many products and this works best. I spray it on and let it sit for a little bit and then put the clothes in the washer. I don't do any scrubbing. This product also doesn't fade colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best enzyme cleaner I've found
customer_reviews.text: This product removes more stains in clothes pre-wash than any other enzyme cleaner I've tried. I will be keeping a supply going forward. I gave this to my daughter who has a similar reaction. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BarringtonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Big money stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge advocate for natural, earth friendly products. I'm willing to go the extra mile and pay the extra buck or more, but this product breaks the bank for what it is and how often I use it. I'm a parent of two toddlers and am constantly getting stains out of clothes. I can't justify the cost for this. It works, but it's not the miracle worker like it should be at this price. My search for a cost effective, natural stain remover that works, continues.
customer_reviews.author: HSnider

customer_reviews.title: really takes out ruff stains! love the!
customer_reviews.text: Was waiting to write review until had enough experience, my daughter got her dress colored with a red permanent marker, due to life being life it took a few days till I got it into the wash, I spritzed some on, didn't even let it soak and stain came out beautiful clean! As if nothing ever occurred! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eczema Boy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely AMAZING! We have an infant who has lots of...accidents. I didnt want to use a harsh chemical stain remover but regular detergent was unable to get out the stains. This spray has been a lifesaver! We use it almost daily and have been able to save numerous outfits, as well as chair / bouncer liners! Very highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nataly Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great, but often breaks open in transit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eco-friendly stain remover, and this definitely does the trick. HOWEVER, much like the detergent, nearly every time that I ordered this, at least one of the bottles broke. It became increasingly frustrating and I just stopped ordering... now I need to find another option!
customer_reviews.author: Evie FoxTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Having a child with many health issues, we try to use as much non toxic items as possible. This is a fantastic product - it works great. Smells great and the company seems like a good company. I'm really glad I found their product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product almost every other day due to our newborn vomiting/poop stains and the occasionally blood stains from my wife. I was shocked by how fast acting and effective it was to remove the stains. I use a small toothbrush to scrub the stains as well sometimes depending on how big or gross it is. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey P

customer_reviews.title: Just works, no muss, no fuss
customer_reviews.text: We bought this originally to help get baby poop stains off of our changing table covers. This product was a lifesaver- we just sprayed stain spots and threw them into the hamper, after a normal wash no more yellow spots! We took the test one step further on white sheets that had gone brown after years of use- first wash saw a solid 75-80% improvement in color. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: toppavak

customer_reviews.title: wow this is good
customer_reviews.text: had a big coffee stain, 3 washes old. sprayed with this until the stain was soaked and then rubbed the stain area together. i waited 3 days later and threw this with the normal wash load. wham, bam the stain was GONE.
customer_reviews.author: oldies (50-60) listener

customer_reviews.title: Superior stain remover!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the quality of this product. It actually removes stains that have been washed and dried numerous times without any success from other stain removers. I had marker stains on carpet from grandchildren playing, and after spraying and allowing it to set for an hour, I was able to blot the ink with very little effort. Just a little spray goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Smartypants

customer_reviews.title: Shipping on time, wrapped well. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it on everything yet, but so far so good. Just don't spray, it doesn't, it is a stream, so you can waste a lot. I just put nozzle on stain and barely squeeze. Works great. Had some ugly stains on carpet and they are gone, spot clean then steam clean. Steam cleaned before and stains we're still there. Just dots, but bugged me
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really, really works! Love it for cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write a review, but I feel I've had the chance to use this stuff on a bunch of different stains. We cloth diaper and use liners, but still the diapers can stain. This spray is amazing at taking those poop stains out of cloth diapers, the best I've tried. I always do a second rinse because any enzyme cleaner can be hard on baby's skin. It works great for food stains, grease, grass, you name it!
customer_reviews.author: FormerlyAGaulzetti

customer_reviews.title: Better Than That "Other" Chem-Filled Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than that "other" (You Know You Make Me Want to........) brand, and I love that it's plant-based. So far, I like all the products I've used from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: awesome natural stain remover
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing! i had wondered if i could find a natural and cruelty free swap for the oh so powerful spray n wash, but dare I say this is BETTER?! I find that I'm not worried about certain materials fading, and the stain removal definitely works. I've even tried this on items I've put through the washer and the dryer previously and it still works. Puracy is great and I've now purchased their dish soap and body wash. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This removed two stains that I wasn't' sure would ever come out. I had already tried using detergent and Shout with no success. This is my new "go-to" for all of my stains!
customer_reviews.author: KDW

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be better than so many products I have tried and it is! It takes out grease stains even if they have previously gone thru the dryer. It has save lots of shirts for me that I was going to throw in the rag bag.
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Works for Getting Out Stains
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spray on stains, shirt collars, etc and gets stains out. I like that it's more natural and free of nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Omg we live for this! It’s so great for baby clothes! Now that baby is eating solids we get lots of stains (also from blow outs!). And I love white onesies so this product is so needed and works amazingly!!! I will never buy another stain remover .
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a grease stain on my T-shirt that wouldn’t come off. I tried dish soap, baking soda, etc. I washed that shirt so many times but the stain wouldn’t come off. I sprayed this on to the stain and let it sit, and it finally came off!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lieu

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this in the past, and it still works like it did before. It's quite effective for stubborn stains on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joel Mason

customer_reviews.title: Buy It - You’ll be Glad You Did
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! It has gotten out: makeup, blood, grass stains, oil, food and more! I also use it around the house for a quick spot/stain treatment. Yes, it’s more expensive than other brands, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: BeckiCaesar

customer_reviews.title: Happy user
customer_reviews.text: Recently I colored hair and got some color washed on a white towel that i used to dry my hair after shower. It got red color. I thought it was ruined till I used this stain remover. Boy, my towel was white again. No bleach was used. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the purchase & that's it a natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husbands white underarm stain t-shirts from deodorant. I sprayed and let it sit for at least 24 hours, It seems to work fairly well. I will use it on a regular basic and hopefully it will take all the stain out. I am pleased with the purchase & that's it a natural cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have allergies to fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This not only does a great job of stain removal but also doesn't 'smell' so bad that I can't have it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: LMP

customer_reviews.title: I was just trying to find a good natural stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I was just trying to find a good natural stain remover, but didn't anticipate being able to find one made in my home state! Love that this product is made locally(ish). As far as the quality of the product is concerned- top notch. I've used it on several small stains that weren't too bad, but I also used it on a set-in berry stain and after treating the stain one time, there is not a trace of the old stain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, probably will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product works well on some stains, not at all on others even with scrubbing. Had higher expectations with all the 5 start reviews. The search continues for the holy grail of stain removers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for spots mostly on clothes. It works great! Love it. It also has removed spots on carpet, upholstery. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: greatdane

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have tried many different stain removal products and this seems to work effectively with any type of stain.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

product_meta.title: Puracy Natural Laundry Stain Remover, Enzyme-Based Spot Cleaner, Free & Clear, 25 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:25 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Puracy Natural Laundry Stain Remover is the most powerful stain removing product available, yet safe for all fabrics. Our bottle features a new and improved fine mist sprayer to maximize coverage. It is the only stain remover powered by all six plant-based enzymes: protease (protein), mannanase (food, cosmetic)pectinase (fruit, sugar)amylase (starch)lipase (fat, oil)cellulase (general soil)we guarantee This product will safely remove any fabric stain you put in its path or your money back. Enzymes are proven to be the safest, most effective ingredients to remove and eliminate stains and odors. Our unique blend of plant-based bio-enzymatic cleaners will tackle hundreds of different stains, residues, odors, and spots - all without bleaching or discoloring fabrics. Think of it like this... If stains are the lock, then enzymes are the key. Our professional strength formula was developed in a lab by a team of Ph.D. Chemists with decades of experience working with Green formulas. It was then reviewed by a team of MDs to evaluate the overall safety and hypoallergenic designation. And finally, it was tested by parents, athletes, and laundry aficionados for performance. Using only a couple of sprays, the head-to-head tests have proven our proprietary blend of plant-based enzymes and natural minerals can clean as well as those packed with harsh, petroleum-based chemicals. Our unique formula will quickly dislodge stains, eliminate odors, remove residues, and leave your fabric clean and fresh. This product is 99.5% natural, per Puracy’s ‘what natural means to us’ definition available on our website.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
NORMAL USE: Spray the affected area and wait at least 15 minutes before laundering. TOUGH STAINS: Spray the affected area and massage the affected area with a soft brush. Wait at least an hour (can be left on for days), then launder with the warmest water the fabric care instructions allow. Opt for the "Extra Rinse" cycle. Some stains may require two treatments. FABRICS YOU CANNOT PUT IN THE WASHING MACHINE: Use exactly as "Normal Use" states. To rinse, take a clean cloth and bowl of warm water. Saturate the cloth with warm water, gently wring, then press into the stain and move back and forth with light pressure. This will pull the stain remover from the surface and replace with fresh water, mimicking a rinsing effect. Rinse cloth and repeat the same steps until the stain remover is "rinsed" from the surface.
feature_bullets: Guaranteed to be the most effective stain remover you’ve ever used
SAFELY REMOVES ANY TYPE OF STAIN: Natural Ingredients, Hypoallergenic, Gluten-Free, Non-Toxic, Non-Bleaching, Biodegradable, Vegan, Certified Cruelty-Free

COMPLETELY ELIMINATES grass, berries, blood, sweat, oil, tomato sauce, watermelon, red wine, mud, cosmetics, pet accidents, and hundreds of other stains and odors; EFFECTIVE ON clothing, linens, carpets, floor mats, dress shirts, bedding, car seats, cloth diapers and other washable fabric
WE DONATE: For every sale, we donate our natural & organic products to children and families that are less fortunate
NATURAL formula is safe for your family, dark colors, delicate fabrics, grey water and septic systems, and the environment; Never tested on animals; 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed; Made in the USA!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
